actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.

official_title: For the relief of Sarabeth M. Davis, Robert S. Borders, Victor Maron, Irving Berke, and Adele E. Conrad.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay Sarabeth M. Davis of Clinton, Washington, Robert S. Borders of Newport Beach, California, Victor Maron of Long Beach, California, Irving Berke of Long Beach, and Adele E. Conrad of Cypress California, for damages they sustained in connection with the air installation compatible use zone study conducted by the Secretary of the Army with respect to Los Alamitos Army Airfield.

titles.title: For the relief of Sarabeth M. Davis, Robert S. Borders, Victor Maron, Irving Berke, and Adele E. Conrad.
